description: Motorola S-Record file format support for Visual Studio Code.
repairOnSaveDesc: Try to repair an srec file each time it's saved.
crcColorFallbackDesc: Whether to force custom color for CRC highlighting (default #ff1744). Enable if the theme color is not obvious.
crcCustomColorDesc: Custom CRC highlight color, only effective when crcColorFallback is true. Supports #RRGGBB or CSS color names.
